description:
This contains additional tests for the Profile objects.  It tests a bunch of things:

 * Multiple bin counts
 * Lazy and unlazy reading
 * Averaging
 * Binning
 * 1D, 2D, 3D profiles

It also adds the nprocs option to {{{fake_random_pf}}} and an assert_rel_equal function which then calls numpy's assert_almost_equal on the relative difference.

*UPDATE 1*: Include projection tests.

 * Test Ones projection along all axes
 * Test weight/unweighted projections
 * Test Density projection

*UPDATE 2*: Turn off progress bar for the projections.  This construction will also allow us better control over some other functionality, if yt detects it's inside the test suite.

*UPDATE 3*: Add tests for covering grids and fix a few bugs that this brought up, which could show up in corner cases -- like the tests!

*UPDATE 4*: Resolve conflicts.  Should be ready to go now.
title: Tests for Profiles

content.raw:
This looks great to me!  Only comment here is that the test_projections.py file spits out a lot of extraneous timing information that interferes with test reporting.  It seems like this should be suppressed: 

    scopatz@ares ~/yt/yt/data_objects/tests yt $ nosetests test_projection.py 
    Initializing tree  0 /  0100% |||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||| Time: 00:00:00 
    Projecting  level  0 /  0 100% ||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||| Time: 00:00:00 
    .......Initializing tree  0 /  0  0% |                                        | ETA:  --Initializing tree  0 /  0100% |||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||| Time: 00:00:00 
    Projecting  level  0 /  0 100% ||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||| Time: 00:00:00 
    .........Initializing tree  0 /  0  0% |                                        | ETA:  Initializing tree  0 /  0100% |||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||| Time: 00:00:00 
    Projecting  level  0 /  0 100% ||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||| Time: 00:00:00 
    .......Initializing tree  0 /  0  0% |                                        | ETA:  --Initializing tree  0 /  0100% |||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||| Time: 00:00:00 
    Projecting  level  0 /  0 100% ||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||| Time: 00:00:00 
    .........Initializing tree  0 /  0  0% |                                        | ETA:  Initializing tree  0 /  0100% |||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||| Time: 00:00:00 
    Projecting  level  0 /  0 100% ||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||| Time: 00:00:00 
    .......Initializing tree  0 /  0  0% |                                        | ETA:  --Initializing tree  0 /  0100% |||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||| Time: 00:00:00 
    Projecting  level  0 /  0 100% ||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||| Time: 00:00:00 
    .........
    ----------------------------------------------------------------------
    Ran 96 tests in 0.391s

    OK
    scopatz@ares ~/yt/yt/data_objects/tests yt $

content.raw: Ah!  You're totally right.  I'll fix and update.
